commandDescription: Upgrades the current project and all metadata to the latest API version
flagApiversionDescription: specify the API version (defaults to API version of your DevHub)
msgNoMetadataInPackageDirectories: No metadata files found in package directories.
successMessage: %s files have been set to API version %s in package directory '%s'.
errorNoSfdxProject: The command isn't run from within a Salesforce DX project folder.
errorInvalidApiVersionFormat: The provided API version format is invalid: %O
errorDevHubConnection: Could not connect to the DevHub for fetching the API version.
